Q_NAME: average of consecutive N Odd no. and Even no.
Q_DESC:
Write a program to find average of
consecutive N Odd no. and Even no.
TESTCASE_1:
3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of first N Even no is 2
Average of first N Odd no is 2
TESTCASE_2:
10
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of first N Even no is 6
Average of first N Odd no is 5
TESTCASE_3:
100
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of first N Even no is 51
Average of first N Odd no is 50
